title: /r/ohffensivememes is just dropping n-bombs and making fun of George Floyd's death among other things.

author: LineOfInquiry
text: The top George Floyd meme seems like it’s more making fun of the police than him tho, I mean it acknowledges that they killed him

author: jumykn
text: In what way is that making fun of the police? They like the fact that he was killed.

author: LineOfInquiry
text: I agree, I’m just saying it’s not as bad as the stuff usually there, where George Floyd is blamed for his death
